;rjodXpavi rnamXpar bzungXbavi mig cesXbyaXbavi dngosXpo ni kunXbrtagsXpavi mig go; ;gzungXba dang vdzinXpavi bdagXnyid du gnasXpa mig gi rnamXpar soXsor snangXba ni rnamXpar brtagsXpavi mig go; ste; smraXbar vdodXpar gyurXpa devi tshe thabs gzhan medXpas gzugs kyi deXbzhinXnyid sgravi deXbzhinXnyid; drivi deXbzhinXnyid cesXbyaXba laXsogsXpavi sgra rnams kyis soXsor phye ste bstanXpa tsam du ;rnamXparXrtogXpa sum cu rtsa bzhiXpo deXdag spangsXpa ni btagsXpa tsam du zadXpar slobXpavi phanXyon du bstan to; ;vdusXbyas kyi khams na yodXpaXvam; vdusXmaXbyas kyi khams na yodXpar yangXdagXpar ;sgyuXma ltaXbur bstanXpas lhavi bu de rnams dgavXbar byas so; ;sangsXrgyas kyi sprulXpa zhesXbyaXba ni deXbzhinXgshegsXpavi sprulXpavo; ;lhavi bu dag gzugs ni zabXpa ma yin phraXba ma yin zhesXbyaXba yang med do zhesXbyaXbavi bar du ste; vdis ni gangXdag deXltar rnamXparXmiXrtogXpavi shesXrab kyi phaXrol tu phyinXpa mngonXsum du byasXpar gyurXpa deXdag nyid tshol barXbyedXpa yin te; deXdag kyang thaXtshig go; ;devi vog tu bsodXnams sngaXma rnams ni mtshanXmavi vduXshes dang ;dmigsXpavi vduXshes can yinXpas dmanXpa yin gyi yongs su bsngoXbavi bsodXnams kyi phungXpo la ni deXdag medXpavi phyir ;yangXdagXpavi don rab tu rtogsXpa dang ;chos thamsXcad jiXltaXbaXbzhin du mngonXparXrdzogsXpar sangsXrgyasXpavi phyir sangsXrgyas zhes byavo; ;bcomXldanXvdas byangXchub ces bgyiXba de gang gi tshig dang ;yongs su bsgyurXbavi grangs su gtogsXpa dang ;dmigsXpa thamsXcad la dbang duXgyurXpa ni dmigsXpa yongsXsuXdagXpavo; ;sems kyi gnasXnganXlen thamsXcad dang bralXbas sems la rnamXpaXthamsXcad du dgeXba vphelXba ni sems yongsXsuXdagXpavo; ;maXrigXpavi phyogsXkyiXgnas ngan len thamsXcad dang bralXbas shesXpar byaXba thamsXcad la shesXpa sgribXpa medXpa dbang duXgyurXpa ni yeXshes yongsXsuXdagXpavo; ;de la dbangXbcu gangXzheXna zhesXbyaXba la jiXsrid vdodXpa deXsrid du vdugXpa ni tsheXlaXdbangXbavo; ;bsamXgtan dang tshadXmedXpa dang ;rnamXpar tharXpa laXsogsXpa sems gnasXpa bzhin du skyeXbaXvdi ni skyeXba la dbangXbavo; ;dngosXpo gangXdangXgang jiXltar mosXpar byasXpa deXdag deXbzhin du vgrubXpa vdiXni mosXpa la dbangXbavo; ;devi smonXlam thamsXcad jiXltar vdodXpa bzhin ;rjes su chagsXpa dang ;khongXkhroXba medXpas dranXpa nyeXbar gzhagXpa gsum ni go slavo; ;bsnyelXba mi mngavXbavi chosXnyid cesXbyaXba ni gangXdangXgang gi tshe jiXltar semsXcan gyi don mdzadXpa devi vdiXsnyedXcig go zhesXbyaXbar mi rungXbas sum cu rtsa gnyis zhesXbyaXbavi grangs donXmed par vgyur ro zheXna; deXyang bden mod kyi vonXkyang thosXpa dang ;dranXpa dag las devi rjesXsuXvbrangXbavi don ;de ni miXg.yoXbavi sngaXltas so zhesXbyaXba ni bdud dang ;phyirXrgolXba dang ;muXstegsXcan laXsogsXpa thamsXcad kyis mi g.yosXpavo; ;phyag dang zhabs draXbas vbrelXba zhesXbyaXba ni phyag gi snang zhing ;draXba bzhin du snangXbavi phyir phyag dang zhabs draXbas vbrelXba zhes vchad do; ;semsXcan phraXmo dag  ;deXbzhinXgshegsXpavi zhabs gnyis kyis reg na shinXtu bdeXbar vgyur zhing ;haXcang thungXba dang ;haXcang sbomXpa dang ;haXcang phraXba dang yoXba laXsogsXpa sorXmovi skyon rnams spangs shing skyonXmed la; phyag gi mthil dang vtshamXpa; tshad dangXldanXpa sorXmo mtharXgyis ;sorXmoXringXba dang ;rtingXpa yangsXpa zhesXbyaXba vdi la ringXba dang yangsXpavi sgra ni ranXpa dang rkyen du babXpavi tshig yin gyi; haXcang ringXba dang haXcang yangsXpavi sgra ni ma yin no; ;sngonXgyiXlas bshadXpa yang ;gsadXpa las tharXpar byasXpa dang ;bzavXba dang btungXba laXsogsXpa byinXpas srog gi rimXgro byasXpa dang ;srogXgcodXpa spangsXpa kun tu bstenXpas zhesXbyaXba vdi la yang ;khru bdun du vphagsXpar mthoXba zhesXbyaXba ni mi thaXmalXpavi lusXpas vphagsXpar mthoXba ste; sku thaXmalXpavi tshad la byavo; ;spyiXgtsug bltar mi mthongXbavi phyir bcomXldanXvdas kyi gzugs kyi rkangXpa dang ;byinXpa miXsdugXpa yin no; ;mi mnyenXpas vgro na mi bde ste vgros miXsdug par vgyur ro; ;bcomXldanXvdas kyi tshigs miXmngonXpas byinXpa mdzes so; ;mnyenXpas vgros sdugXpa yin no; g.yoXbar mi mngon no; ;zhabs kyang bdeXblag tu bsgyur du rung la; mdunXrgyab dang ;g.yas g.yos su vdug ste bltas kyang zhabs kyi mthil snang zhing vgros sdug go; ;skuvi spu gyen du phyogsXpa zhesXbyaXba ni skyesXbuXchenXpo rnams kyi skuvi spu rnams spuvi khungXbu nas skyeXba na; zhal bzangXpo la gyen du ltaXba vdraXbar rtseXmo gyen du lta zhing skyeXbavo; ;sngonXgyiXlas kyang kunXrdzob kyi thaXsnyad kyi phyir mdzad do; ;spu reXre nas skye zhing g.yas su vkhyilXpa zhesXbyaXba ni spuvi khungXbu gcig nas spu gcig khoXna skyeXbas na spu reXre skyeXbavo; ;kyilXkyilXpor vkhyilXba ni g.yasXphyogs su vkhyilXba ste; rgyan gdubXkor sbrul vkhyilXba ltaXbuvam; sbrul vkhyilXbavi zlumXpa ltaXbu ste; gnyisXka yang g.yas su vkhyilXbavo; ;zhalXla mdzodXspuvi mtshan mngavXba su vkhyilXba rtseXmo gyen du phyogsXpa dang ;shingXtog skyuXruXra tsam la dngul gyi sgoXnga vdraXba gang gi zhal na mdzesXpar vdugXpa de la zhalXla mdzodXspuvi mtshan mngavXba zhes byavo; ;mtshan vdi gnyis kyi sngonXgyiXlas kyang ;vduXvdzi spangsXpas ni spu reXre bar gyur to; ;phaXma laXsogsXpa jiXltar rigsXpavi gnas su bkodXpa dang ;rimXgro byasXpa dang ;sbyinXpa byinXpa dang ;ma mguXbar ma byasXpa laXsogsXpas g.yas su vkhyil zhing ringXba dang ;dbyibs legsXpar gyur to; ;roXstod sengXgevi ltaXbu zhesXbyaXba ni devi roXstod sengXgevi roXstod vdraXbavi phyir sengXgevi roXstod ltaXbu ste brang gi dbyes yangs shing che la shaXrgyasXpas spangs shing cheXba phunXsumXtshogsXpavi phyir deXskad ces byavo; ;dpungXmgo legsXpar grubXpa zhesXbyaXba la; legsXpavi sgra ni zlumXpa la byavo; ;grubXpavi sgra ni mgulXpa rtsavi draXba miXmngonXpa bstanXpa ste;gser gyi bumXpavi mgulXpa ltar yongs su zlum zhing shinXtu mkhregs zhesXbyaXbavi thaXtshig go; ;sngonXgyiXlas kyang mi snyanXpar mi zerXba ni sengXgevi tshul dang vdraXba dang ;mgul mdzesXpavi rgyu yin no; ;gzhan la mi smodXpa ni sengXge ltar yangsXpavi rgyuvo; ;snyanXparXsmraXba dang ;legsXpar smraXba brjodXpa dang ;sengXgevi sgra dang mthunXpar smraXba ni lkogXma mdzesXpavi rgyuvo; ;thalXgong rgyasXpa zhesXbyaXba ni thalXgong rgyas shing yangsXpavo; ;ro broXba mkhyenXpa zhesXbyaXba ni roXdrugXpo dag gi ro broXba mkhyenXpa la ro broXba mkhyenXpa zhes byavo; ;skabs vdir mkhyenXpa ni dgavXbaXla bya ste; phar vdzinXmar vdzin zhesXbyaXba laXsogsXpa bzhin du; ro rnams kyis dgav zhing tshimXpar gyurXpavi phyir ro broXba shesXpa zhes bya ste skyesXbuXchenXpo rnams kyis midXpa na ni ro tshorXbar byedXpavi rtsa bdun stong gyen du ltaXba yod do; ;thaXna til gyi vbrumXbu tsam zhig gsol na yang sku thamsXcad du khyabXpar vgyur ro; ;ro thamsXcad kyi zhal du bcug na; bdudXrtsivi ro dang vdraXbar vgyur te; de ni mtshan gyi las so; ;sngonXgyiXlas dang mthunXpa ni go slavo; ;shing nxyaXgro dxhaXltar chuXzhengXgabXpa zhesXbyaXba vdi laXkha cig naXre nxyaXgro zhesXbyaXba ni nganXpa ste; roXsmad la byavo; ;ro dxhaXzhesXbyaXba ni roXstod do; ;chuXzhengXgabXpa zhesXbyaXba ni mthunXpa la bya ste; gang gi sku lteXba nas bzung ste; roXstod dang roXsmad tshad mnyamXpar gyurXpa de la nxyaXgro dxhaXltar chung zhengXgabXpa zhesXbyaXbavo zhes zer ro; ;gzhanXdag naXre nxyaXgro zhesXbyaXba ni skuvi dbu nas zhabs kyi bar gyi tshad la byavo; ;ro dxhaXni zhengXla byavo; ;chuXzhengXgabXpa zhesXbyaXba ni vdom la bya ste; de la gang gi skuvi chuXzheng vdom dang mnyamXpar gyurXpa de la nxyaXgro dxhaXltar chuXzheng gab ces byavo zer ro; ;gzhanXdag ni shing nxyaXgro dxhaXzhesXbyaXba sdongXpo dang yalXga rnams chuXzheng mnyamXpa zhig yod de; de dang vdraXbar skyesXbuXchenXpo rnams kyi sku thamsXcad kyang vdom gyi tshad dang rgyasXpa yin no zhes vchad do; ;gzhanXdag naXre mtshan vdiXni vphralXbavi dbyes yongs su rgyasXpa bstanXpavi phyir te; skyesXbuXchenXpo rnams kyi vphralXba ni rnaXba g.yasXpavi gong nas rnaXba g.yonXpavi gong gi bar du shavi dbyibs legsXpa; vphralXbavi dbyes yongs su rdzogsXpa; rgyalXpo gser gyi gtsugXtor bcingsXpa vdraXbar mdzesXpavo zhes smravo; ;sngonXgyiXlas kyang dgeXbaviXlas byedXpa phyir tshogs kyi gtsoXbor gyur nas; ma zhumXpar mgo bstod de vjigXpa medXpar sbyorXba devi phyir dbu gtsugXtorXcan du gyur to; ;deXbasXna mngavXdbang chenXpo mngavXbavi sngaXltas zhes byavo; ;ljags ring zhing srabXpa zhesXbyaXba ringXba ni cheXbavam khrun ringXbavo; ;srabXpa ni mnyenXpavo; ;tshangsXpavi dbyangs zhesXbyaXba ni tshangsXpavi dbyangs dang mtshungsXpavam; dbyangs mchog yinXpavi phyir ;yiXge gcig mngonXpar sgrubXpa la mkhasXpar gyis shig cesXbyaXba ni gzodXma nas ma skyesXpavi phyir a ni chos thamsXcad kyi sgovo zhesXbyaXba laXsogsXpa yiXgeviXgzungs kyi sgovi rimXpas yiXge gcig gis kyis; rabXvbyor de ji snyam du sems zhesXbyaXba laXsogsXpas vdiXskad bkav stsal te byangXchubXsemsXdpav ni semsXcan nam vkhorXba mi mthong ngo ;rmiXlam laXsogsXpavi dpe deXdag gis sngon mthong mod kyi; vonXkyang deXdag medXpar semsXcan rnams kyis mi shes te; deXbasXna deXdag shesXpar byedXpa ni devi skyesXbuvi mthu yin no zhes bstan te; deXnyid rabXvbyor galXte; semsXcan rnams rangXrang gis dangXbcasXpar rnamXpar bkodXpar gyur na; deXltaXna ni skyon du yang vgyur na; vdiXltar deXdag thamsXcad ni mtshanXmaXmedXpa ste; devi phyir nyesXpa med do zhes ston to; ;des chos kyi dbyings rnamXpar ;rabXvbyor galXte; chos kyi dbyings su maXgtogsXpavi chos vgavXzhig yod na ni rnamXpar dkrugs par yang vgyur na zhesXbyaXba laXsogsXpas; bcomXldanXvdas kyis vdiXskad du; deXltar rtog tu zin kyang
